Trade/Device Name(s): Contour Next USB Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Bayer Contour Next USB Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Contour Next USB blood glucose meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Contour Next USB Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood at home by persons with diabetes
Indications for Use Summary: Over-the-counter device for single-patient home use to quantitatively measure glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertip and palm; not intended for diagnosis or screening of diabetes mellitus or for neonates.
